title: 1954년 In re the Accounting of Howlett 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: In re the Accounting of Howlett. 판결일: 1954-05-05. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In the Matter of the Accounting of Leona S. Howlett, as of Harold A. Howlett, S. J. Reynolds
**판결일**: 1954-05-05
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

**판사**: Wheeler

## 인용

- 283 A.D. 991

## 판결문 요약


Decree reversed on the facts and matter remitted to the Surrogate’s Court for further proceedings, with costs to appellant, on the ground that the verdict of the jury and decision of the Surrogate are against the weight of evidence.
...
